description: T1 Tulip tree - remove approx. 4 lower branches over road, pavement and neighbour's driveway.T2 Conifer growing from neighbouring garden - trim back to boundary.T3 Conifers - raise crown height by approx. 6 metres and trim back to boundary.T4 Holly trees raise crown height up to approx. Up to 5 metres from ground.T5 Laurel - remove one lower limb which extends over a small garden, and raise crown lift up to 5 metres from ground.
